Generation VIII.Sword: Through its nose, it sucks in the emanations produced by people and Pokémon when they feel annoyed. It thrives off this negative energy.
Generation VIII.Shield: It sneaks into people's homes, stealing things and feasting on the negative energy of the frustrated occupants.

Generation IX.Scarlet: The reason this Pokémon causes trouble for those it feels close to is because Impidimp itself gets irritable if it can’t absorb negative emotions.
Generation IX.Violet: They live in groups, pestering and playing pranks on each other to polish their troublemaking skills.
